name: Guru Network
description: The Guru Network design addresses this gap by focusing on AI-driven user flow orchestration across both on-chain and off-chain sides, providing a robust framework for real-world user actions and blockchain business process automation(BBPA). With Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol (CCIP) protocol integration Guru Network can effectively serve as Multi Chain AI compute Layer 3 which allows apps and users to natively embed orchestrated AI Agents into their routines and earn Network participant rewards.
